"One that has covered all the sides and had an unlimited energy source, that 
a ideal base" said Hydras

-----Original Message----- 
From: Super Cyclonus
Sent: Saturday, October 23, 2010 3:29 PM
To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com
Subject: Re: The wrath of the Hydra/The return of a decepticon

> <OLD>
>
> "That's a point that I havent think yet" replied Hydras "But I have some
> ideas to built a safer base and the best of all totally under my control 
> as
> I like, I wont like to take chances"

Cryotek just watched Hydras carefully, his optics dark and
introspective. He folded his hands in front of him, carefully
interlacing his fingers, his optics never leaving Hydras.

After a moment he smiled as if coming to some decision, "So, what kind
of base are looking to construct?"

"You're not looking to side with him are you?" Obsidian said from his
position, hovering over a security station.

Without turning Cryotek said, "I will make whatever choice that I deem
fit for those under my command." he turned his full attention on
Obsidian, "Or are you challenging me for command?" Cryotek's voice was
calm and controlled, and yet there was danger in it all the same.

"No sir, never." Obsidian said,m his voice much lower than before.

"Good! Then get back to work!"

Cryotek turned back to Hydras, "Ahh yes, where were we? Yeeesss, so
what type of base are you looking for Hydras?"

(TAG)

Preston
